title: Local Grocer
description: Replication of a grocery store. Users can sign up and sign in, add items to cart and check out. Still under construction.

title: Crypto Tracker
description: Quick and simple tool that allows users to keep track of their favourite crypto currencies.

title: Apex Shield Swap Tool
description: A tool that allows players of the popular Battle Royale game, Apex Legends, to practice a specific game mechanic.

title: TITAN
description: A mobile application that allows users to easily keep track of their gym/workout history and progress.
